translated: Irene Curie (Irène Joliot-Curie after her marriage) is a French physicist, born 12 September 1897 in Paris and died March 17, 1956 (to 59) in Paris.
original: Irène Curie (Irène Joliot-Curie après son mariage) est une physicienne française, née le 12 septembre 1897 à Paris et morte le 17 mars 1956 (à 59 ans) à Paris.
